overview:
JumpPanel â€“ open the right thing, right away.

JumpPanel is a time-saving application that allows you monitor and create shortcuts to shared digital assets on Windows PCs. JumpPanel can alert you when shared files are changed or added to a watched folder. No longer do you have to remain shackled to a pre-determined file structure, by application, by a most-recently-opened list, or a singular file that is buried deep in Windows. Organize access and monitor what you want. Youâ€™ll enjoy fast access and your own custom view of related digital files, regardless of their application type.
